trans-unit.source: This article describes how to use Dynamic Management Views (DMVs) to monitor your workload and investigate query execution in Azure SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: This article describes how to use Dynamic Management Views (DMVs) to monitor your workload and investigate query execution in Azure SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: Permissions
trans-unit.target: Permissions

trans-unit.source: In SQL Data Warehouse, querying a dynamic management view requires **VIEW DATABASE STATE** permissions.
trans-unit.target: In SQL Data Warehouse, querying a dynamic management view requires **VIEW DATABASE STATE** permissions.

trans-unit.source: The **VIEW DATABASE STATE** permission returns information about all objects within the current database.
trans-unit.target: The **VIEW DATABASE STATE** permission returns information about all objects within the current database.
